mention.text: KIEV , May 8 -LRB- RIA Novosti -RRB- The Kiev authorities special operation in southeastern Ukraine will continue regardless of the decision of the Donetsk People s Republic to hold a referendum on the region
Russian President Vladimir Putin on Wednesday
an immediate withdrawal of Ukrainian troops
the start of comprehensive national dialogue
